author: jih2nn
content: In current version of FOCIL, we don't support blob transactions. Should we add a rule that checks if there is no blob transactions in the ILs to the P2P validation?

author: terencechain
content:
To the CL, transaction content is just opaque bytes, it can't tell whether it is a blob tx or not
But the EL can. If an IL transaction includes a type 3 tx, the EL should skip it
We can amend this behavior in the execution layer spec or the EIP

author: jih2nn
content: Let me add this to execution-api. Thanks!

author: soispoke
content: just flagging Vitalik's latest post as it mentions FOCIL a lot, in case you guys have thoughts https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/formalizing-decentralization-goals-in-the-context-of-larger-l1-gaslimits-and-2020s-era-tech/23942
